name: LinuxFortune
0:
”Alexa, open Linux Fortune”
”Alexa, ask Linux Fortune for a fortune”
”Alexa, ask Linux Fortune to say something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: linux fortune
des: This skill will get a random quote from the Linux fortune file.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
